attributes.additional_details:
The NHS belongs to the British public not the government of the day, they are just custodians for the term of power.
This government has no right to privatise a national treasure. The government should ask the people who elect them to power if they would like a private medical system.
As a British citizen I demand the Conservative government stop the backdoor privatisation of our health service and have an open debate, even a referendum to see if  the electorate would like the NHS to be privatised.
